cell_name.title: CellName appends the Liberty cell label to every exported time-series.

collect_jvm_metrics.title: CollectJVMMetrics toggles JVM/base scope metrics scraped from the MicroProfile endpoint.

collect_rest_matching.title: CollectRESTMatching filters REST endpoints using glob-style patterns (supports `*`, `?`, `!` prefixes).

collect_rest_metrics.title: CollectRESTMetrics toggles per-endpoint REST/JAX-RS metrics (may introduce cardinality).

max_rest_endpoints.title: MaxRESTEndpoints limits how many REST endpoints are exported when REST metrics are enabled (0 disables the limit).

metrics_endpoint.title: MetricsEndpoint overrides the metrics path relative to the base URL (accepts absolute URLs as well).

node_name.title: NodeName appends the Liberty node label to every exported time-series.

server_name.title: ServerName appends the Liberty server label to every exported time-series.
